attributes.action: Abolish A2 motorcycle licence and become fully un-restricted after 2 years
attributes.additional_details:
16 cbt - 50 cc
17 cbt - 125cx now allowing 250 cc on L plates 
19 restricted licence 
21 derestricted license 
24 and above complete a direct access 

Remove the need for additional tests once passed restricted licence stay restricted for 2 years then automatically upgrade to full derestricted licence
attributes.background: Back in 2013 the UK Government changed the laws on motorcycle licence having to take additional tests after being restricted for 2 years and having to fork out more money for for another mod1 and mod2 when it should go back to how it used to be and full unrestricted after 2 years automatically
